text:
You look around for guests of distinctive height. There is a very short man wearing a feathered cap. Nearby, pouring wine into his mouth from a long-stemmed glass, there is a short fat man in grey furs. You notice one fellow in a green wig who seems to be tall, but this may be because he's very thin. A large man dressed in a bear costume sweeps past swinging a bell, and he seems to be the tallest person present.

Whom will you approach?

choices.text: ... the man with the feathered cap
... the man in the green wig
... or the man dressed as a bear
